page.title: 11RELIGIOUS LIFE IN WINCANTON
page.content: I talked to the{Rector}of the Parish Church. The Rector deals with many people in trouble. When someone dies he visits the relations, tries to under-stand their feelings and arranges the service with them. He talks to sick people in hospital and old people in nursing homes and helps to make them feel better. He takes the Sunday{Services}in church, baptises babies and conducts marriages.He opens fetes and makes speeches, such as crowning the Rose Queen at the Primary {School}Revels. Other churches are Catholics,Methodists, Baptists,Quakers and Wincanton Christian Fellowship. All churches teach that{Jesus Christ {died}so we may be forgiven by God, and rose from the dead so people, who put their faith and trust in Him, may live in heaven for ever.
